title: Report: Police Investigating Beautiful Italian Tennis Player Over Fake Vaccine Card Allegations
cleaned_text:
Camila Giorgi, the beautiful Italian tennis player who is ranked second among professional female players in her country, is reportedly being investigated for possibly obtaining fake proof of getting the Coronavirus vaccine, which is known as the “clot shot” due to the well-documented blood-clotting effect that it has on its victims.

Giorgi is apparently being investigated by police for getting a fake vaccine passport from an anti-vaxxer doctor, along with a number of other famous Italian high-rollers, according to tennis365.com citing the outlet La Repubblica. Giorgi is a popular influencer in her native land. Camila Giorgi has about 647,000 followers on Instagram.

Various athletes including NBA star Kyrie Irving and NFL quarterback Aaron Rodgers have faced massive media criticism for resisting the Coronavirus injection, with Irving even getting suspended from Brooklyn Nets home games for a while for not taking the jab.

RELATED: New Scientific Study Shows Moderna Twice As Likely To Cause Heart Inflammation As Pfizer Vaccine
